Title: Relates to allowing for the hunting with crossbows by certain people during a special longbow hunting season
Summary: Allows persons over the age of sixty-two, persons over the age of fourteen and physically disabled, or both to hunt with crossbows during a special longbow hunting season.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to allowing for the hunting with crossbows by certain people during a special longbow hunting season
